entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assert failure in GC/API/NoGCRegion/Callback_Svr test #86612
  • `GenTreeAddrMode` has implicit truncation for its `gtOffset` field #86609
    Future
  • ComInterfaceGenerator does not support by-value In and Out attributes for unmanaged-to-managed stubs #86608
  • aspnetcore 8 preview 4 blazor wasm size regression #86601
  • publish a Microsoft.NET.WebAssembly.Webcil nuget to the transport feed #86597
    8.0.0
  • Document the `Thread_AssignCpuGroups` config var #86596
    8.0.0
  • [Tracking] Figure out how we should handle the disposing of the meters created from meter factory #86592
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `ValueTextEquals` supporting `JsonEncodedText` as a parameter #86591
  • [API Proposal]: Make `IPAddress`es comparable #86589
  • Incorrect RequiresDynamicCode attribute on System.Type.GetEnumValues #86585
    8.0.0
  • Trimmer implementation of type hierarchy marking shows order dependent behavior #86580
  • [API Proposal]: Convert.ToBoolean supports "1" and "0" values #86579
  • Create custom InlineArray marshaller for `LibraryImport` generator #86572
    8.0.0
  • [8.0.100-preview.5.23269.37] global tool "dotnet-snow" cannot load libSkiaSharp.dll #86571
  • Test failure Interop\\COM\\Activator\\Activator\\Activator #86569
    8.0.0
  • [AOT] ExpressionTree AOT very slow #86568
  • Test failure System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.ReadWrite_Random_Success #86565
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.FileSystemWatcherTests_netstandard17.DroppedWatcher_Collectible #86564
    Future
  • Test failure XmlSerializerTests.Xml_NookTypes #86563
  • Test failure GC\\Scenarios\\NDPin\\ndpinfinal\\ndpinfinal.cmd #86562

Closed

  • [WinHttpHandler] Long running test: ResponseHeadersRead_SynchronizationContextNotUsedByHandler on Win7/Win8 #54034
    Future
  • JIT: Failures in crossgen2 related tests with physical promotion enabled #86588
    8.0.0
  • Can't build runtime on Ubuntu 20.04 (LTS) due to native PGO format #86531
  • Enable EventPipe test for NativeAOT #84701
    8.0.0
  • Local linux builds should not enable PGO by default #85785
  • Size saving opportunity for System.Text.Json generators with custom converters #84015
    8.0.0
  • AOT 32-bits #86558
  • [API Proposal]: Move IPNetwork to System.Net and add a string constructor #86584
  • Mono incorrectly throws a TypeLoadException for a recursive type definition #85821
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'varTypeMap[type] != TYP_UNDEF' in 'Test.Program:testEquals(System.Numerics.Vector3):int' during 'Morph - Structs/AddrExp' #85608
    8.0.0
  • Set Browsable property value at runtime by reflection #86544
  • Test failure System.Net.Mail.Tests.LoggingTest.EventSource_EventsRaisedAsExpected #85754
  • System.Text.Json Desrialization to an IParsable<T> #86529
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandlerFunctional.Tests.BidirectionStreamingTest.AfterReadResponseServerError_ClientWrite #85233
    Future
  • Console UTF-8 input is misbehaving on Windows #43295
    Future
  • [mono] Change bound delegates dependency of bound_method + delegate_type to use just delegate_type #83329
    8.0.0
  • Code coverage failing for corelib #81835
    8.0.0
  • when native AOT support to compile to 32 bit application #86570
  • Android x86/x64 CI machine issue: Failure calling service package: Broken pipe #86383
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] No longer discard jiterp inference information when crossing a branch #86611
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Add get AppContext properties diagnostic IPC command #86610
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Cache some allocations when invoking Linq.Expression lambdas. #86607
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add `DiagnosticOr<T>` type for gracefully handling failures in incremental generator transformations #86603
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix Incorrect RequiresDynamicCode attribute message #86602
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Abstract out System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator #86594
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix possible stack overflow in TotalOrderIeee754Comparer #86593
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono][aot] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods on iOS #86583
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • [DRAFT][mono][AOT] Enabled tests which fail to JIT compile during AOT #86581
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono][tests] Run Mono iOS sample on Helix #86578
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [6.0-staging] Disable DllImportSearchPathsTest in mobile #86576
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][infra] Upgrade iOS performance queue to OSX 13 #86574
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Metrics APIs Additions #86567
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Add a test for the first chance exception event to NativeAOT smoke tests #86560
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Rename setting for using RID graph to System.Runtime.Loader.UseRidGraph #86598
    area-Host
  • Ensure Avx512Vbmi has [Intrinsic] on the right members #86604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • JIT: Switch basic block successors to a visitor pattern #86543
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch physical promotion stress modes to only be enabled in checked builds #86590
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid capturing diagnostic objects in Regex source generator incremental values #86606
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Avoid capturing diagnostic objects in SG incremental values #86605
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [6.0] Missing version number bump #86600
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Baseline a couple more JIT tests #86429
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Ensure that the shuffle zero mask copies all bits #86453
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Avoid ToString allocations for each ISpanFormattable value in string.Concat/Join(..., IEnumerable<T>) #86521
    area-System.Runtime
  • Vectorize IEnumerable<T>.Sum where possible #84519
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Apply the SourceWriter pattern to the STJ source generator. #86526
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Rename a couple model specs for config binding generator #86459
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some bugs in the test sets 'System.Runtime.Tests' and 'System.Linq.Expressions.Tests' for loongarch64. #86435
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Update createdumpwindows to not appear to succeed after getting ERROR_PARTIAL_COPY 5 times #85462
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Vectorize shorter buffers for CRC-32 on Intel #86539
    tenet-performance, community-contribution, area-System.IO.Hashing, 8.0.0
  • [mono] When creating an array type, don't do full initialization of the element type #85828
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Disable JitOptimizationSensitive check on NativeAOT testing #86523
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Lots of tweaks to FrozenDictionary/Set analysis and hashing #86293
    area-System.Collections
  • This fixes an issue with gradual decommit in scenarios where we have … #84975
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use new queue for iOS arm64 device tests #86575
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][aot] Enabling AOT wrappers for virtual delegates #85643
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix code coverage of corelib by updating coverlet #86566
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Refactor name convention #86446
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Increase timeouts on perf-slow pipeline (because of current load on queues). #86547
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add DebuggerDisplay for SearchValues #86559
    area-System.Runtime

Updated

  • [7.0] Remove centos 8 images #86477
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [6.0] Remove centos 8 images #86478
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Guarded devirtualization: devirtualize dual-morphic interface calls on NativeAOT #86551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector128/256/512.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Avoid calling Encoding.GetBytes when Vector128 is not hardware accelerated #85267
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Up Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #86530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2186124 #86535
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Unreachable filter end #86492
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Update GetElement and ToScalar to lower IND, LCL_FLD, and LCL_VAR specially #86400
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use cinv and cneg instead of csel when possible #84926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix endless loop in illink analyzer #86449
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Fix invalid "double.ToString" behavior with two section separators #85565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fixing the InstructionSetDesc implications #86486
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Warn if StringMarshalling doesn't match base and warn if base interface cannot be generated #86467
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Only call Free in unmanaged->managed stubs when ownership has been transfered to the callee #86415
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Initial work to enable EventPipe in Linux #86226
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Add JIT support for the methods in Vector64<T>/Vector128<T> on amd64. #86546
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Handle different SIMD moves in peephole optimization #85875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Expose setting CPU SamplingProfiler rate #83635
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Fix crossgen2.pdb #86512
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • SHA3 #84132
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [WIP] Fold const WithElement to CNS_VEC #86212
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Turn webcil off for .NET < 8.0 #86505
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Dogfood ComInterfaceGenerator in crossgen2 #84643
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [debugger][mono] Block multithreading debugger failures #86501
    test-failure, area-Debugger-mono, area-Threading-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Enable the "TC_QuickJitForLoops" on LoongArch64. #86022
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SequenceReader performance; elide bounds checks and book-keeping #82765
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Convert.Try{From/To}HexString #86556
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement compare native function #85965
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Delete `GT_ASG` #85871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve BigInteger operators +, - and * for trivial cases #84733
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Attempt to fix unfailing helix test run when testResults.xml are missing #86342
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add option to decrypt Quic traffic in debug builds #83001
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Making mono_inst_name less misleading #83570
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix branch #86482
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Deduplicate runtime invoke wrappers on iOS #85908
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Dynamic heap count #86245
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add PipeOptions.FirstPipeInstance enum value #83936
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Allow overbudget for small methods #86473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft][browser] threads experiment #86278
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Adapt Tarjan generic cycle detector for use in Crossgen2 #71426
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    blocked, os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Update ILCompiler paths to handle PublishAotUsingRuntimePack=true #85996
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Read public GC options if available #86068
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Support for 32 bit application in NativeAOT #2285

PullRequests

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge runtime to 17 May 2023 #2283
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement two-pass exception handling #2284

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Performance regression on wasm builds #32744
  • Reenable framework roslyn tests for 7.0.3xx branch #32737
  • `dotnet tool install`s unlisted and depreciated version #32728
  • SourceLink: Repository instance not found in cache #32714

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #32743
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add back legacy JS hot reload function #32738
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package (#29787) #32734
    Area-Compilers, Servicing-consider
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #32730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.14.1 to 20.0.0 in /eng/dependabot #32713
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2185920 #32664
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.14.1 to 20.0.0 in /eng/dependabot #32712
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Add warning for optional workload EOL #32658
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Add warning for optional workload EOL #32657
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix StaticWebAssets Brotli asset deduplication #32700
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32614
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers.IntegrationTests: support running with podman. #32716
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers/CreateNewImage: don't change the user to root when ContainerUser is empty. #32594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [Blazor] Support loading the Blazor WebAssembly SDK when targeting net8.0-browser #32688
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Make GeneratePublishDependencyFile incremental #32305
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Update SDK in global.json to upgrade WebAssembly tests #32687
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Enable EventSourceSupport in ASP.NET Native AOT apps #32538
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Interactive mode proof of concept #30832
    Area-dotnet new
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Customize Go To Definition for Source Generated types and members #68294
  • EnC: Adding public method to a library and invoking it within the same edit session #68293
  • MissingMethodException in VS 17.6 RoslynCodeAnalysisService process when source generator loads another assembly #68290
  • VB.NET AnalyzeDataFlow incorrectly reports parameters as WrittenInside #68286
  • IDE0063 doesn't identify "simple using statement" in top-level expressions #68285
    Backlog

Closed

  • use git sh.exe exec dotnet publish --framework net7.0 -r win-x64 -c xx #68274
  • EnC test scenario: Exception remapping #24253
  • Two source-build prebuilts #67894
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33722.199 #68292
  • `SimpleDiagnostic` class uses reference equality when comparing message arguments #68291
  • `global using` produces unnecessary TypeRef in output file #68250

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch to primary constructors in IDE layer #68299
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make ConstantTextAndVersionSource no longer a ValueSource. #68298
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support 'foreach' for inline arrays. #68297
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Fix offered options for 'use primary constructor' #68296
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge RecoverableText and WeaklyCachedRecoverableValueSource into one type #68295
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Move `UseSimpleUsingStatement` tests to `VerifyCS` #68288
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Only pack the shipping/non-shipping nupkgs for roslyn #67679
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Use correct ref-pack versions #67895
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Enable IDE0079 (unnecessary suppression analyzer) for LSP pull diagnostics mode #68287
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix collection literal format spacing #68284
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • Add new (hopefully easier) telemetry mechanism #68261
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Expect mapped paths in InterceptsLocationAttribute #68242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add FilterTree/FilterSpan API on remaining analysis contexts #68052
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics
  • Rationalize how temporary directory works today #68226
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support for ref returning methods and properties in `With` statement. #68203
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Locals and Returns, untriaged
  • Fix inconsistencies around MemberNames #68262
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix Color Color const field initialization accessing the Color type #68283
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Ensure that we always run all diagnostic suppressors for single file analysis #68270
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • app.UseRouting must be called after `UsePathBase` #48370
  • Throw custom error types instead of generic errors inside the HubConnection class #48362
  • Add a judgment condition in app.UseHttpLogging() #48360
  • [Question] .NET6 Minimal API model binding error handling and Environment. #48355

Closed

  • The different behaviors in Blazor WebAssembly after setting the DefaultLayout property of the AuthorizeRouteView in App.razor. #48310
  • Adding compression directives to a csproj breaks a Linux build with DN8P4 #48353
  • (WebSockets transport) There was an error with the transport #48303
  • Found Medium Risk in SCA scan with NuGet Package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features (CVE-2022-21986) #48359

PullRequests

Created

  • Unquarantine `IHttpActivityFeatureIsPopulated` #48371
    area-infrastructure, area-hosting
  • Migrate RDF-specific tests to shared infrastructure (part 2) #48369
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • use new System.Text.Ascii APIs, remove internal helpers #48368
    area-runtime
  • Try updating to python3 #48367
    area-infrastructure
  • Don't run publish-specific Mvc.Testing tasks if project is not publishable #48364
    area-mvc, feature-mvc-testing, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Add some notes on testing trimming #48333
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Add IHttpSysRequestTimingFeature to support accessing http.sys timing info #48218
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview5
  • Update BuildFromSource.md to reflect need for VS on Windows #48365
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Update SDK #48252
    area-infrastructure
  • Add a test confirming that X509Certificate is trimmed #48295
    area-hosting
  • Enable Blazor Server and WebAssembly components to run in the same document #48294
    area-blazor
  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #48338
    area-signalr
  • HttpContext debugger display tweaks and fixes #48321
    area-runtime
  • DisableInferBodyFromParameters in RDG. #48269
    area-runtime, feature-rdg, 8.0-preview5
  • Updated the AddPolicyRegistry extension methods to use TryAdd and TryAddEnumerable internally #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Add new Blazor Web Template #48285
    area-mvc
  • [Blazor] Source generator to create the discovery information at compile time. #48284
    area-blazor
  • Code Fix for AfterOnResourceExecution Diagnostic Event. #48077
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Bump selenium-standalone to 8.3.0 - allow E2E testing on osx-arm64 #48288
    area-infrastructure
  • DO NOT REVIEW Stress test x509 test #48332
    area-infrastructure
  • Uses Fallback When Without Repository #48103
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Issue #45096 Toru_Watanbe #48352
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching
  • Use `Type.IsByRefLike`. #48351
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Diagnostics Repo Engineering Summary #3884
  • Missing symbols for only dotnet code #3900

PullRequests

  • Add GetAppContextProperties diagnostic IPC command #3901

Merged

  • Clean up IRuntime instance flushing #3895

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to switch .NET MAUI Flyout of Shell to the right with FlowDirection? #15221
  • xmlns can't access its classes #15217
  • On iOS Launcher.OpenAsync presents Open-In/ShareSheet Menu but closes immediately (.net MAUI) #15216
  • Assets file '.../MauiTutorialProject/obj/project.assets.json' not found. Run NuGet package restore to generate this file. #15215
  • RadioButton rendered incorrectly in MacCatalyst #15214
  • VS 2022 on Mac OS renders CheckBox as round with MacCatalyts/iPad Mini Target #15213
  • [NET 8, Windows] wrong initial BindingConext in CollectionView DataTemplate #15212
  • Hamburger icon is not visible when using flyout with Flyout Page #15211
  • TextColor throws exception on Windows Machine #15210
  • Rendering of CollectionView takes too much time #15204

Closed

  • [Windows] MAUI app crashes when XAML Hot Reloading ShellContent within Shell.xaml #13775
    Backlog
  • .Net MAUI conversion of SVG text into PNG is incorrect. #11302
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Sending POST API method in iOS using hot restart is not working #15075
  • Having Shell NavBar Visible shortens visible part of the page on the bottom #14914
    Backlog
  • ScrollView does not scrollable to the End after window height resized. #8113
    Backlog
  • DatePicker and TimePicker opened unexpectedly when navigating back to previous page on Android API 21 and 23 #8130
  • Unable to add a certificate to iOS keychain #15068

PullRequests

Created

  • Legacy gallery filtered solutions #15219
  • Implements Color.Equal() correctly #15218
  • Update All (most) BindableProperty XML docs (Backport #14704) #15208
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.8.0.1 to 1.9.0 #15206
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • [shell] [windows] fix NRE when clearing shell items #15220
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • Bump coverlet.collector from 3.2.0 to 6.0.0 #15207
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Add UITest Gallery and some simple tests #15191
    area/testing
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Fixed removing items from the shell causing a crash #15098
    area/shell 🐢
  • Use Frame command to recalc span bounds #15168
    area/controls 🎮

  • [ios] fix memory leaks in ContentView #15193

  • Publish ControlGallery to run tests #15194

  • Fix Android WebAuth callback for system browser flows #15187

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Actually use InExpression with subquery #30955
  • Compiled Models: Entity Type Namespaces #30945
  • The binary operator Equal is not defined for the types 'System.Nullable`1[System.DateTime]' and 'System.DateTime' #30944
  • EF 7 not loading my entities when using Eager or Explicit loading (Blazor Server)... #30943

Closed

  • How can i disable the new "OPENJSON" feature when using primitive collections? #30946
  • Context.ChangeTracker in EFCore 7 is "losing" added entities #30787
  • How to compare, migrate, and update tables and entities using EF methods #30941

PullRequests

Created

  • Normalize Any to Contains instead of vice versa #30956
  • Update SDK #30954
    area-infrastructure
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.core from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5 #30953
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlcipher from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5 #30952
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5 #30951
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.1.2 to 8.2.0 #30950
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_winsqlite3 from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5 #30949
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Allow value comparers for supertypes of the mapping's type #30939
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Add analyzer/codefix for usage of interpolated strings in raw query methods #30835
